languages.text: "Мы изучаем и наблюдаем. И помогаем кораблю, когда можем. Много механизмов... без нашего касания им было бы плохо".
"We have been studying and observing. And helping the ship when we can. So many mechanisms... they would have suffered without our input."
languages.original_text: "Мы изучаем и наблюдаем. И помогаем кораблю, когда можем. Много механизмов... без нашего касания им было бы плохо".

traits.locale_text: "We have been studying and observing. And helping the ship when we can. So many mechanisms... they would have suffered without our input."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "We have been studying and observing. And helping the ship when we can. So many mechanisms... they would have suffered without our input."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "We have been studying and observing. And helping the ship when we can. So many mechanisms... they would have suffered without our input."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "We have been studying and observing. And helping the ship when we can. So many mechanisms... they would have suffered without our input."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: «Hemos estado estudiando y observando. Ayudando a la nave cuando podemos. Tantos mecanismos... sufrirían sin nuestra participación».
languages.original_text: "We have been studying and observing. And helping the ship when we can. So many mechanisms... they would have suffered without our input."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos estado estudiando y observando. Ayudando a la nave cuando podemos. Tantos mecanismos... sufrirían sin nuestra participación».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: 「研究し、観察していた。そして可能な時は船の手助けをしていた。機構があまりに多い…我々が介入していなければ、かなり苦しかっただろう」
languages.original_text: "We have been studying and observing. And helping the ship when we can. So many mechanisms... they would have suffered without our input."

traits.locale_text: 「研究し、観察していた。そして可能な時は船の手助けをしていた。機構があまりに多い…我々が介入していなければ、かなり苦しかっただろう」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: “我们一直在学习、观察，尽我们所能帮助这艘舰船。这么多机械装置……如果没有我们的介入，它们会很痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "We have been studying and observing. And helping the ship when we can. So many mechanisms... they would have suffered without our input."

traits.locale_text: “我们一直在学习、观察，尽我们所能帮助这艘舰船。这么多机械装置……如果没有我们的介入，它们会很痛苦。”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: « Nous étudions, nous observons et nous aidons le vaisseau quand nous le pouvons. Tant de mécanismes... auraient souffert sans notre intervention. »
languages.original_text: "We have been studying and observing. And helping the ship when we can. So many mechanisms... they would have suffered without our input."

traits.locale_text: « Nous étudions, nous observons et nous aidons le vaisseau quand nous le pouvons. Tant de mécanismes... auraient souffert sans notre intervention. »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Wir haben studiert und beobachtet. Und dem Schiff geholfen, wenn wir können. So viele Mechanismen ... ohne unsere Eingaben hätten sie gelitten."
languages.original_text: "We have been studying and observing. And helping the ship when we can. So many mechanisms... they would have suffered without our input."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben studiert und beobachtet. Und dem Schiff geholfen, wenn wir können. So viele Mechanismen ... ohne unsere Eingaben hätten sie gelitten."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Çalışmalarımızı ve gözlemlerimizi sürdürüyoruz. Vakit buldukça gemi işlerine yardımcı oluyoruz. Onca mekanizma... Biz olmasak çok çekerdi."
languages.original_text: "We have been studying and observing. And helping the ship when we can. So many mechanisms... they would have suffered without our input."

traits.locale_text: "Çalışmalarımızı ve gözlemlerimizi sürdürüyoruz. Vakit buldukça gemi işlerine yardımcı oluyoruz. Onca mekanizma... Biz olmasak çok çekerdi."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
